testcase.name: Akademie Live Environment Rechnung Checkout clickpath

failure.message:
Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.click()` could not be issued because this element is currently animating:
`<button type="submit" name="addProduct" class="btn btn-fullwidth btn-primary" title="In den Warenkorb" data-testing-id="addToCartButton" data-tracking-productdetail-cta-click="">Jetzt b...</button>`
You can fix this problem by: - Passing `{force: true}` which disables all error checking - Passing `{waitForAnimations: false}` which disables waiting on animations - Passing `{animationDistanceThreshold: 20}` which decreases the sensitivity
https://on.cypress.io/element-is-animating
